_description: Interdependency mapping and causal chain validation for questions across dimensions

dimension_flow.description: Logical flow and dependencies between dimensions in the evaluation framework

DIM02_ACTIVIDADES.rationale: Activities must be informed by diagnostic findings and baselines
DIM02_ACTIVIDADES.validation_rule: Activities should reference problems/gaps identified in DIM01

DIM03_PRODUCTOS.validation_rule: Each product must be traceable to at least one activity

DIM04_RESULTADOS.rationale: Results are outcomes derived from delivery of products
DIM04_RESULTADOS.validation_rule: Results must show causal link to products (product → outcome logic)

DIM05_IMPACTOS.rationale: Impacts are long-term changes driven by accumulated results
DIM05_IMPACTOS.validation_rule: Impacts must be linked to results with explicit transmission mechanisms

DIM06_CAUSALIDAD.rationale: Theory of change synthesizes the entire causal chain
DIM06_CAUSALIDAD.validation_rule: Theory of change must reference elements from all prior dimensions

causal_chain_templates.description: Templates for validating causal logic across dimension boundaries

explicit_chain.structure: DIM06 must explicitly articulate: supuestos + mediadores + moderadores connecting DIM02→DIM03→DIM04→DIM05

rule_001.description: Every activity (DIM02) must reference at least one diagnostic finding (DIM01)
rule_001.validation_query: Check if DIM02 questions contain references to DIM01 elements (problems, gaps, baselines)

rule_002.description: Every product (DIM03) must be traceable to at least one activity (DIM02)
rule_002.validation_query: Verify DIM03 products link to DIM02 activities via pattern matching or explicit references

rule_003.description: Results (DIM04) must show input-output logic from products (DIM03)
rule_003.validation_query: Validate that DIM04 results can be derived from DIM03 products

rule_004.description: Impacts (DIM05) must specify transmission pathways from results (DIM04)
rule_004.validation_query: Check if DIM05 impacts describe how results lead to long-term changes

rule_005.description: Theory of change (DIM06) must synthesize the complete chain
rule_005.validation_query: Validate DIM06 references elements from DIM01-DIM05

rule_006.description: Budget allocation (DIM02/DIM03) must align with identified gaps (DIM01)
rule_006.validation_query: Check if resource allocation addresses highest-priority gaps

rule_007.description: Indicators in DIM03/DIM04 must be measurable against baselines in DIM01
rule_007.validation_query: Verify indicator units and sources align with DIM01 baselines

policy_area_coherence_rules.description: Rules for validating coherence within a policy area across dimensions

PA_coherence_check.description: All 6 dimensions must be present for each policy area
PA_coherence_check.validation_query: Check that each policy area (PA01-PA10) has questions in all dimensions (DIM01-DIM06)

PA_thematic_consistency.description: Policy area keywords should be consistent across dimensions
PA_thematic_consistency.validation_query: Validate that policy area keywords appear in questions across multiple dimensions

cluster_integration_rules.description: Rules for validating integration across policy areas within a cluster

CL_cross_reference.description: Clusters should show explicit cross-references between constituent policy areas
CL_cross_reference.validation_query: Check for references between policy areas within the same cluster

CL_shared_indicators.description: Policy areas in a cluster should share at least one common indicator
CL_shared_indicators.validation_query: Identify shared indicators across policy areas in the same cluster

temporal_coherence_rules.description: Rules for validating temporal consistency across the causal chain

temporal_ordering.description: Temporal horizons must increase along the causal chain

mayoral_term_constraint.description: Activities and products must fit within 4-year mayoral term
mayoral_term_constraint.validation_query: Verify DIM02/DIM03 timelines do not exceed 4 years

circular_reasoning_detection.description: Rules to detect and prevent circular reasoning in causal chains

tautology_detection.description: Detect statements like 'We will achieve X by achieving X'

outcome_activity_conflation.description: Detect when outcomes are described as activities
outcome_activity_conflation.validation_query: Check if DIM04 results are worded as actions (verbs) instead of states (nouns)

validation_workflow.step_1: Load all questions for a policy area across all dimensions
validation_workflow.step_6: Generate interdependency report with violations and warnings

interdependency_scoring.description: How interdependency validation affects overall scores

perfect_chain.criteria: All validation rules pass with no warnings

broken_chain.criteria: One or more error-level validation rules fail

weak_chain.criteria: More than 3 warning-level validation rules fail
